mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id , u.name , u.email , u.password , u.role , u.intro , u.feed_type , i.id as image_id , i.org_file as image_url FROM user u LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON u.image_id = i.id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.use_yn = 'Y' ;
SELECT * FROM user WHERE id = #{id} AND use_yn = 'Y' ;
SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id LIKE CONCAT( #{keyword}, '%') AND use_yn = 'Y' ;
